item.description: Short Intro It is a well-known fact that people aren‚Äôt capable of using all the potential hidden inside their personal computers, laptops or even smartphones. Just stop for a second and look around: we have technology that is capable of things that we cannot possibly imagine, yet we struggle to create a website that doesn‚Äôt lag on the newest MacBook Pro or create an android app that won‚Äôt crash every now and then on an 8 gig snapdragon 845 smartphone.
